Hadoop HDFS Change Log

Release 0.22.1 - Unreleased

  • INCOMPATIBLE CHANGES    (none)
  • NEW FEATURES    (none)
  • IMPROVEMENTS    (none)
  • OPTIMIZATIONS    (none)
  • BUG FIXES    (none)

Release 0.22.0 - 2011-11-29

  • INCOMPATIBLE CHANGES    (1)
    1. HDFS-1825. Remove thriftfs contrib.
      (nigel via eli)
  • NEW FEATURES    (21)
    1. HDFS-1921. saveNamespace can cause NN to be unable to come up on restart.
      (Matt Foley)
    2. HDFS-992. Re-factor block access token implementation to conform to the generic Token interface in Common
      (Kan Zhang and Jitendra Pandey via jghoman)
    3. HDFS-599. Allow NameNode to have a seprate port for service requests from client requests.
      (Dmytro Molkov via hairong)
    4. HDFS-1004. Update NN to support Kerberized SSL from HADOOP-6584.
      (jghoman and Kan Zhang via jghoman)
    5. HDFS-1005. Fsck security.
      (borya and Kan Zhang via jghoman)
    6. HDFS-1006. getImage/putImage http requests should be https for the case of security enabled.
      (borya and jghoman via jghoman)
    7. HDFS-1033. In secure clusters, NN and SNN should verify that the remote principal during image and edits transfer.
      (jghoman)
    8. HDFS-1023. Allow http server to start as regular principal if https principal not defined.
      (jghoman)
    9. HDFS-1150. Verify datanodes' identities to clients in secure clusters.
      (jghoman)
    10. HDFS-1330. Make RPCs to DataNodes timeout.
      (hairong)
    11. HDFS-202. HDFS support of listLocatedStatus introduced in HADOOP-6870. HDFS piggyback block locations to each file status when listing a directory.
      (hairong)
    12. HDFS-1361. Add -fileStatus operation to NNThroughputBenchmark.
      (shv)
    13. HDFS-1435. Provide an option to store fsimage compressed.
      (hairong)
    14. HDFS-903. Support fsimage validation through MD5 checksum.
      (hairong)
    15. HDFS-1457. Provide an option to throttle image transmission between pimary and secondary NameNodes.
      (Yifei Lu and hairong via hairong)
    16. HDFS-1164. TestHdfsProxy is failing.
      (Todd Lipcon via cos)
    17. HDFS-811. Add metrics, failure reporting and additional tests for HDFS-457.
      (eli)
    18. HDFS-895. Allow hflush/sync to occur in parallel with new writes to the file.
      (Todd Lipcon via hairong)
    19. HDFS-528. Add ability for safemode to wait for a minimum number of live datanodes
      (Todd Lipcon via eli)
    20. HDFS-1850. DN should transmit absolute failed volume count rather than increments to the NN.
      (eli)
    21. HDFS-671. Documentation change for updated configuration keys.
      (tomwhite via eli)
  • IMPROVEMENTS    (78)
    1. HDFS-1304. Add a new unit test for HftpFileSystem.open(..).
      (szetszwo)
    2. HDFS-1096. fix for prev. commit.
      (boryas)
    3. HDFS-1096. allow dfsadmin/mradmin refresh of superuser proxy group mappings
      (boryas)
    4. HDFS-1146. Javadoc for getDelegationTokenSecretManager in FSNamesystem
      (jnp via boryas)
    5. HDFS-1132. Refactor TestFileStatus
      (Eli Collins via cos)
    6. HDFS-1163. normalize property names for JT/NN kerberos principal names in configuration (from HADOOP 6633)
      (boryas)
    7. HDFS-1003. authorization checks for inter-server protocol (based on HADOOP-6600)
      (boryas)
    8. HDFS-1061. Memory footprint optimization for INodeFile object.
      (Bharath Mundlapudi via jghoman)
    9. HDFS-1079. Throw exceptions as specified by the AbstractFileSystem in HDFS implemenation and protocols.
      (suresh)
    10. HDFS-1112. Edit log buffer should not grow unfoundedly.
      (hairong)
    11. HDFS-1119. Introduce a GSet interface to BlocksMap.
      (szetszwo)
    12. HDFS-1184. Replace tabs in code with spaces.
      (Jeff Ames via jghoman)
    13. HDFS-1185. Remove duplicate now() functions in DataNode, FSNamesysetm.
      (Jeff Ames via jghoman)
    14. HDFS-1183. Remove some duplicate code in NamenodeJspHelper.java.
      (Jeff Ames via jghoman)
    15. HDFS-1190. Remove unused getNamenode() method from DataNode.
      (Jeff Ames via jghoman)
    16. HDFS-1110. Reuses objects for commonly used file names in namenode to reduce the heap usage.
      (suresh)
    17. HDFS-752. Add interfaces classification to to HDFS source code.
      (suresh)
    18. HDFS-947. An Hftp read request is redirected to a datanode that has the most replicas of the blocks in the file.
      (Dmytro Molkov via dhruba)
    19. HDFS-1272. Fixes to take care of the changes in HADOOP-6845.
      (Jitendra Pandey via ddas)
    20. HDFS-1298 - Add support in HDFS for new statistics added in FileSystem to track the file system operations.
      (suresh)
    21. HDFS-1201. The HDFS component for HADOOP-6632.
      (Kan Zhang & Jitendra Pandey via ddas)
    22. HDFS-1307 Add start time, end time and total time taken for FSCK to FSCK report
      (suresh)
    23. HDFS-1302. The HDFS side of the changes corresponding to HADOOP-6861.
      (Jitendra Pandey & Owen O'Malley via ddas)
    24. HDFS-1315. Add fsck event to audit log and remove other audit log events corresponding to FSCK listStatus and open calls.
      (suresh)
    25. HDFS-1178. The NameNode servlets should not use RPC to connect to the NameNode.
      (Kan Zhang via jghoman)
    26. HDFS-1130. Adds dfs.cluster.administrator ACL configuration that can be used to control who can view the default hdfs servlets.
      (ddas)
    27. HDFS-1297. Fix some comments.
      (Jeff Ames via jghoman)
    28. HDFS-330. Datanode Web UIs should provide robots.txt.
      (Allen Wittenauer via jghoman)
    29. HDFS-881. Refactor DataNode Packet header into DataTransferProtocol.
      (Todd Lipcon via jghoman)
    30. HDFS-1036. docs for fetchdt
    31. HDFS-1318. Add JMX interface for read access to namenode and datanode web UI information. (Tanping Wang via suresh).
    32. HDFS-1356. Provide information as to whether or not security is enabled on web interface for NameNode
      (boryas)
    33. HDFS-1205. FSDatasetAsyncDiskService should name its threads.
      (Todd Lipcon via eli)
    34. HDFS-1111. Introduce getCorruptFileBlocks() for fsck.
      (Sriram Rao via shv)
    35. HDFS-1395. Add @Override to FSDataset methods that implement FSDatasetInterface methods.
      (suresh)
    36. HDFS-1383. Improve the error messages when using hftp://.
      (szetszwo)
    37. HDFS-1093. Change the FSNamesystem lock to a read/write lock.
      (dhruba)
    38. HDFS-1407. Change DataTransferProtocol methods to use Block instead of individual elements of Block.
      (suresh)
    39. HDFS-1417. Add @Override to SimulatedFSDataset methods that implement FSDatasetInterface methods.
      (suresh)

    Release 0.20.3 - 2011-1-5

    • IMPROVEMENTS    (none)
    • BUG FIXES    (6)
      1. HDFS-955. New implementation of saveNamespace() to avoid loss of edits when name-node fails during saving.
        (shv)
      2. HDFS-1041. DFSClient.getFileChecksum(..) should retry if connection to the first datanode fails.
        (szetszwo)
      3. HDFS-909. Wait until edits syncing is finishes before purging edits.
        (Todd Lipcon via shv)
      4. HDFS-1258. Clearing namespace quota on "/" corrupts fs image.
        (Aaron T. Myers via szetszwo)
      5. HDFS-132. Fix namenode to not report files deleted metrics for deletions done while replaying edits during startup.
        (suresh & shv)
      6. HDFS-1406. TestCLI fails on Ubuntu with default /etc/hosts.
        (cos)
